title: Skeleton
summaries: Skeletons are enemies that spawn in the Cavern layer. They follow the Fighter AI and can open doors. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, they can only do so during Blood Moons or in Graveyards. Regular Skeletons can be spawned by the Skeleton Statue.
In Expert Mode(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions), certain Skeletons are able to throw bones. Regular bone-throwing Skeletons can be spawned by the Bone Skeleton Statue in any difficulty.
